tag_list: feature-film, film, movies, production-design, art-director, art-direction, graphic-design, website, web, web-design, it
overview:
Sandmerrick, Inc. is a diversified design studio for the entertainment, commercial and corporate sectors.

Entertainment Services Sandmerrick, Inc. offers a wide range of celebrated services for feature films, Internet, web series, television and video projects including Screenwriting, Direction, Production Design, Art Direction, Set Design & Decoration, Props, Wardrobe and Graphic Design.

Design Services Sandmerrick, Inc. is a diversified full service design studio that offers video and photography services, 2D/3D modeling and animation, logo design, print and much more.

Web Design & Development We offer professional web design and development services that include HTML5, Drupal, content management systems, database programming, application development, e-commerce just to name a few.

Advanced Information & Technology Solutions Sandmerrick, Inc. specializes in advanced IT solutions for the modern business including remote system, network, software, web and VMware support.
